attributes.action: Change the way e-petitions work on the petitions.pm.gov.uk website by adding For or Against tick boxes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Like most petitions you only see the numbers of people agreeing to the petition.  If for or against tick boxes were added to the petition, the figures would be more meaningful.

rejection.details:
This issue has been covered in our FAQs:

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/faq
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
